titleStmt.title: Lazarus W. Powell and Archibald Dixon to James F. Robinson
CWG8992

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p:
Henderson Kentucky
Aug 10th 1863
Hon James F Robinson
Gov of Kentucky
Frankfort Ky
Dr. sir

Jackson McClain Wm S Sloan & W S Stanley securities of Dacius Prost Lat sheriff of Henderson Co. have Petitioned your Excellency to remit the damages assessed against them as securities of said shriff, Judgement was rendered against ^them^ for this $2,650 & some cents for damages -- they will pay the principle & interest & desire the damages remitted -- the facts set forth in the petition are true, the Petitioners are most worthy & respectable gentlemen -- We believe the case is one in which the Executive should intepose -- we therefore respectfully request your Excellency to remit the damages aforesaid

We have the honor to be
your obt sert
L W Powell
Archd Dixon

Principal Int. & costs paid Aug 25th 1863.
Att Grant Green
Audr
